assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Arata Corporation engages in the wholesale of daily goods, cosmetics, household goods, pet supplies, and others in Japan. The company offers health and beauty products, including cosmetics, hair and body care, and healthcare products; household detergents, such as clothing detergents, home-related cleaners, and dishwashing and kitchen detergents; home care products, including insecticides, air fresheners and deodorizers, and batteries; paper products, which include tissues, toilet paper, and disposable diapers; and household goods comprising kitchen supplies, cleaning equipment, and cooking implements. It is also involved in the retail, wholesale, and import/export sale of pets, and pet food and accessories, as well as sells pet-related products online; pet styling and grooming activities; recruiting of franchised stores; and store management activities, as well as research and development of pet shop franchise systems; operation of pet hotels; and manufacturing and sale of cosmetics. Arata Corporation was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
